name: gumfish
text: You know, I never really noticed Ray's tail before. KISS MY TAIL, BITCH

text: the look on Teodor's face when Ray screams at him is perfect.

text:
His hands!!!

" My stars! "

name: jetbunny
text:
Teodor doesn't have hands. But then, I only read panels two and five.

MAGIC HAAAANDS

text:
Excellent choice of avatar friend.

Gummy worm zombie, however, is superior.

text: Purple is a good album. It is a good Stone Temple Pilots album.

text: A comment left by doc_rostov was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, amandulence, TheSoulBear)

text: That is a turtleneck.

name: luckypyjamas
text: eeee!

name: cracker
text:
There is evidence which suggests Ray does not actually have a tail.

It has been hypothesized that the tail is actually a part of his thong.

name: akarroa
text: Maybe his tail blew off in the explosion and he never had one after that.

name: mangtastic
text: Maybe that is not Ray running from that automobile.

name: hyetal
text: That's not evidence, there's no reason to believe that is Ray, especially because Ray has a tail and that character does not.

name: epicurus
text: That's not Ray you wingus

name: saurkraus
text: I have read this 97 times and it still hasn't got old.

name: theryanking
text: A comment left by theryanking was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by nighttoad, riotdejaneiro, Overmedicated, Vondicus, Ariamaki, lamelliform, GMM, rascaldom, apricotta, rhymesforkids, ConnorMc, revfitz, GusPlease, scraggg, Mastronaut, gkiyo)

name: peng33
text:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M9MnF3BMCmY

DUANE!

name: afastidioushat
text: I think we all have a friend named Duane who we get inebriated with.

name: heyman
text: Duane IS the friend I get inebriated with

name: anathan
text: Duane is a bad influence. He likes watching NASCAR and blowing stuff up with M80s. He has a big pile of cigarette butts in the middle of his coffee table that he's too lazy to clean up.

name: powderfinger
text: oh man, replace NASCAR with COPS and I was Duane from the years of 2004-2006. Then I got a girlfriend and a college education and fucked up all my fun.

name: pascal
text:
"...but in a way that may be too strong for people."
Hilarious.

name: sidd2600
text: T-adore done tensed up like a bitch

name: overmedicated
text: This is my favourite comment on Acheworld, for reasons I can't quite fathon.

name: mr_pete
text: I prefer the whiskey where you look your life in the face, but you are okay with it.

name: atom
text: That would have to be Early Times.  "Just like Dad used to drink before he beat me!"

name: tourach3
text:
i've always preferred evan williams
early times seems like water to me
i once drank a whole bottle of it in a night and got pissed off because i was still sober :-(

name: theryuujin
text: Nonsense!

name: gormster
text:
Dude. Someone replaced your whisky with water.

I hate to be the one to break this to you, but it is completely impossible for even the most hardened drunk to imbibe 750mL of 80 proof liquor and still be even remotely considered "sober".

name: farqussus
text: in his unconscious dreams he was wandering around the party, mildly irritated at his lack of inebriation, later walking home early. In his life he was evacuating his bowels in the McDonald's carpark while two fourteen year olds stole his left shoe.

name: spicyponyhead
text: Daddy drinks because you cry.

name: kotekan
text: Daddy drank for the government.

name: nsrdude
text: A comment left by nsrdude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Smallberries, Overmedicated, chivalress, bug, Girdag, brzbee, abe)

name: atom
text: I dig how proudly Ray is surveying his bounty in the first panel.

name: thisdoggisproice
text: I like Téodor clutching his face in anticipation, and the calm before the storm after Ray takes a swig.

name: varnish
text: But when you get to Duane's, the sumbitch is already passed out on the couch, empty bottle of Simple Man in one hand and the remote in the other, tv on the local cable access channel, where it's showing tommorow's lunch specials at the elementary school. So you grab a couple of bud's from the open fridge and head out. That's Duane for you.

name: alejandroadam
text: this actually does accureately discribe many college friends.

name: zem
text: normally i overlook spelling stuff but this one made me wince twice

name: trap
text:
I'm imagining Tom Waits singing this right now.

Still on the fence.

name: tekende
text: I imagine him slowly speaking the words, his voice rumbling from his throat in an unhurried manner, not unlike the vocals on "What's He Building?".

name: anomalous3
text: It is the whiskey of circumstances

name: zefiel
text: My life's much better since I've introduced Whiskey to it.

name: eric
text: This is my favorite strip.  It gave me my new favourite way to exit awkward situations.

name: howard
text: I must say that most whiskeys tend to get me like that.

name: senseihollywood
text: A comment left by senseihollywood was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Thorfinn, Carpetbag, sredni, dracer2, Direhaggis)

name: closefriend
text: Every time I tell someone about this strip, they laugh for 30 seconds, followed by, "Who's Duane?"

name: eviltkat
text: That whiskey got Ray hella sassy

name: 1000hz
text: The all-black bottle was actually just a bottle of Mad Dog.

name: nessotron
text: Your mind always calls to your drunken self that Duane will be all kinds of fun. In reality, he's like a hairier, dirtier, version of Lyle, who sprawls on the couch snoring, TV blaring, and the lights always not quite run out, but they sure 'aint burning right.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: how in Hell could there be a dirtier version of Lyle..?

name: dj_insomniac
text: Not to mention hairier, considering that Lyle is a tiger?

name: zapatos
text: Lyle doesn't have hair on his palms.

name: qingofchina
text: I think that is regular whiskey mood.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Something tells me Ray's pulled off of that second bottle once or twice before

name: darkwaffle
text: Smart money says the all black bottle is really Gusano Rojo.

name: hawaiian_robot
text: I think it's just straight Whiskey.

name: flavius
text: Looks like this wild card liquor must have been my father's favorite when I was a kid. I'm glad I can blame something other than myself for his abuse.

name: deancain29
text: Teodors face in the 2nd to last panel

name: molesticide
text:
this one makes you tell a story about a really big bug you saw once outside a movie theatre then rape your girlfriend.

actually, that was the gusano rojo. in my defense, SHE bought it. and i did not know that gusano rojo actually existed, for real, until she did. laughed for like ten minutes when i did, nobody had any idea why.

name: zem
text: uhhhhhh

name: zem
text: what

name: zem
text: did this guy just confess to rape and go largely ignored for two years? am i missing something

name: fineoakstructure
text: Dude, he said she bought it. Not his fault.

name: gournal
text: Plus I think the rape part of the story is forgotten when you start thinking about the really big bug that he saw outside a movie theater.

name: yoboyobo_ni
text: rape his girlfriend?  Am I the only one who sees the oxymoron in that?

name: lizard
text: You mean "girl" and "friend" apparently

name: i_love_kate
text: Am I the only one who sees the terrifying attitudes expressed in these two comments?

name: lizard
text: You're not reading it right.

name: i_love_kate
text: Haha, oh yeah, your comment is fine.

name: fineoakstructure
text: what the shit?  what's aiu doing in the archives?  Get the hell outta here, you little prick; scram!

name: scifigrl47
text:
Yes, because it's clear that once a woman agrees to date you, that is it for her legal rights, and her ability to control what touches and goes into her body.

"But we're DATING" is not an adequate defense for rape. Conversely, "He said since we're dating, I was obligated to put up with rape, so that's why I hit the son-of-a-bitch with my car," is an excellent defense. "Hit him with my car twice" is pushing it, however.

name: jackparsons
text: Agave cacti have a very mild hallucinogen in the roots. There's a class of tequila made from this that you can't get here in the states.

name: paco
text: How exactly would one describe the effect of this bottle? I can't quite find the right adjective.

name: aelindil
text: Definitely not afraid of the fucking police.

name: apricotta
text: I want to give that comment all my chubbies.

name: fuzzery
text: RUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUDE

name: grandpayum
text: oh my god teodors arms in the second to last panel are the most hilarious things

name: dwade
text: Ray is so furious in the second to last panel he is shaking. Duane had better be ready for one angry cat!

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: I guess I'm havin' a bad week!
Nice Pete: I am going to throw a party.
Little Nephew: SG server mus' be BR0k3N

"It iz m-possible 2 say how hott the GIFs of mah joint were, usin' language technology."

name: riazm
text: In my daydreams I imagine I can talk like little nephew writes.

name: i_love_kate
text: How can you possibly accidentally leave something in the microwave for fifteen minutes, and then realise sometime later?

name: mangtastic
text: Marijuana.

name: justa
text:
See, I figure "Duane's" to be one of those hell of run down taverns with the busted-up plastic Spuds MacKenzie sign in the front window and cigarette butts all just lying everywhere on the floor.

That is what my mind conjures when someone says "KISS MY ASS, BITCH! I'LL BE AT DUANE'S!"

name: direhaggis
text: Ray stone cold sassed Teodor. Only way it could've been topped is if he bobbed his head to the side and snapped his fingers after while strutting outside.

name: jonmw
text: I don't recall seeing this particular pose of Ray before. (last panel)

name: wonelove
text:
This Friday I will leave every room with style,
yelling
"KISS MY ASS BITCH! I'LL BE AT DUANE's!"

name: aaron_haynes
text: At least he tells you where he's going, though.

name: 7th_shot
text: I was visiting my mother this week and thus was unable to leave the room in style.

name: mustakrakesh
text: Ah the good ole days at Duane's

name: mikeronomicon
text: Trailer Park in a bottle, now that's an invention. Though I think white trash multiplies fast enough already.

name: gigoloferocious
text: I know what i'm getting for xmas!

name: tonyhighwind
text:
Dear Assetbar,

Are you here, not because you love Achewood, but because there is someone in your life who does, and you are trying to understand them more? Try this trick: Randomly show them just the first panel of this comic. Then time how long they laugh. Wait a few months, do it again, and see how the two times match up. It's fun!

But it will not, unfortunately, help you understand your friend better.

name: fancyrat
text: Wouldn'tve been a five but for the slap.

name: dasilodavi
text: Frankly, my guess is the other 9 bottles have a similar effect.

name: audry
text: The Magic Hat of wiskeys

name: greenkoolayd
text: the all-black bottle is 'belligerent, surly, and abusive'.

name: carlyle
text: Abusive Husband whiskey. It's not too good.

name: archimedes2000
text: Words to live by. (alt text)

name: libelandslander
text:
"...boisterous and friendly, but in a way that will be too strong for some people."
Why did they make a whiskey out of my personality? My personality sucks
